item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

i found this in the files how do i put a url there so it will download the cache from dropbox?

public static String getWebClientCachePath(int build) { return new StringBuilder(System.getProperty("user.home")).append( "/.matrix_cache_32"+build).toString(); }
